roleset.name: make confusing, obscuring, causing to be confusing

example.name: not great, but it works
example.text: Government lending was not intended to be a way [*] to obfuscate spending figures, hide fraudulent activity, or provide large subsidies.

example.name: both args
example.text: Di Canio's beliefs aren't the problem, it's his obfuscation of them

roleset.note: OBFUSCATE-V NOTES: One of the beautiful words of English. (from obfuscate.01-v)
OBFUSCATION-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, obfuscate.01. No VNcls. (from obfuscation.01-n)
